pr_title: Resources: fix NPE when trying to get non-existing resource

timeline.message: Resources: fix NPE when trying to get non-existing resource

timeline.bodyText: In which case the result be null?
timeline.author: yaohaizh

replies.bodyText: When user request to get unavailable resource(like incorrect id or resource deleted), the server return CloudException. From SDK side, we catch the exception and return NULL inside the generated inners object.
replies.author: xseeseesee

timeline.message: Resources: support api version when listing generic resources
